1387380.name: Cepheus Protocol - Pandemic Mode Soundtrack
1387380.description:
This is the original soundtrack (OST) for Cepheus Protocol - Pandemic Mode, composed by Georg Mausolf.

Tracklist:
01 - Main Theme
02 - Captain Winter
03 - Exploring the Island 1
04 - Fighting the Infected 1
05 - Exploring the Island 2
06 - Exploring the Island 3
07 - Fighting the Infected 2
08 – BONUS TRACK: Cepheus Protocol Trailer Music

About 26 minutes of music total.

These are the tracks that are used in the early access. For the campaign, additional, completely new music will be composed.
